data.title: Great Papa Johns
data.text: We ordered pizza for delivery from the Papa Johns while on a cross country trip. The service was great ! They were very helpful on the phone and the delivery was right on time. One of the more friendly and helpful Papa Johns we've ordered from and that really made the difference when travelling !!

data.title: Quick  fast and still hot when it arrived
data.text: We were in a bind having lost my wallet but  I knew the CC# by heart and used it to make an online order. The order arrived at the hotel  still hot and very yummy!

data.title: Good Pizza, Good Service - Papa Johns
data.text: Had a pizza delivered to our hotel.  They were timely and the delivery person was very friendly.  We felt bad that he had to come for just a medium pizza but he wasn't concerned.  Pizza was very good.  First time I had one from Papa Johns.

data.title: Guaranteed Next one is worse
data.text: This location must have new management that has to make its #'s.  Tonight I swear they delivered someone else's pizza.  The crust was thin (never order that) and the toppings were few.  I believe I will locate a new favorite Pizza Delivery place.
